data.text: @wsbgnl The Centers for Disease used a Sharpie to eliminate covid.
@MattChambers13 @wsbgnl San Diego was red last week. I can't find it for this week, or with the new all-green method.
@MarylandOnenita @wsbgnl Exactly.  The numbers are under reported.

@NickTheNewbie @wsbgnl Sewage monitoring is the most sensitive early-warning system for a community. And until we better understand Long COVID, I am not sold on mitigation of hospitalizations in the acute phase of the illness as being the primary goal.
@ESMenkin @wsbgnl Fair enough, but wouldn't the ratio of mild cases to serious cases then dictate the threshold  for when preventative measures must be taken when cases are on the rise?
@TheCrisses @Poposh21 @wsbgnl 12+ years old got the right dosage
@VanessaFuchsArt @debroby @wsbgnl Sorry to hear that. Prayers for a swift recovery! I knew some people who've had resperatory issues for about 3.5 months and it wasn't fun for them, either. :/
